text.desc: The body is made up of bone plates and has a hard thorn to resist predators. They are outstanding masters of camouflage, and the seaweed leaf-shaped translucent appendages on the surface can disguise them as seaweed to escape the enemy.

Commonly known as "bubble fish." Inhabiting the middle and lower layers of the ocean, a few species enter the freshwater rivers. When they encounter foreign enemies, the abdominal cavity balloon expands rapidly, causing the whole body to float to the surface, and the small thorns on the skin are erected for self-defense.

Also known as "Parrotfish", the color is gorgeous, and the mouth shape resembles a parrot mouth type. There is a row of teeth in the mouth, which can bite hard corals, and even the poisonous food can be eaten properly.
It is a kind of all-around fish that climbs, swims and flies. The three fins of its pectoral fin are independent and free to move.

Also known as frog fish. There are a total of 45 species of squid in the world in different shapes, sizes and colors. They all have the ability to disguise and change shape depending on the surrounding environment. When preying, they dance the bait ball that grows like a worm in the head, tempting the prey.

Also known as the Yang skill fish, there is a long tubular kiss-like protrusion with a small mouth at the end of the protrusion. The mouth fish is distributed in tropical waters and has more than 200 varieties.

The body is small, the body has an angular shape, and only the fins, mouth, and eyes can move. Since the lid is not movable, it is only possible to open the mouth at any time to allow water to flow from the mouth into the ankle. The body surface can secrete venom.

The sunfish's body is round and flat, like a big dish. There is a long, pointed fin on the body of the fish and the belly of the fish, but the caudal fins are almost non-existent, so they look as if they have been cut off.

The multicolored body is black when the body length is 235 mm or less. When it grows to 650 to 1030 mm, it becomes a black-blue or blue male fish. When the body length is 995 to 1220 mm, it changes from blue to hermaphroditic. Blue-yellow; when the body length reaches 1175 mm or more, the body color becomes golden yellow female fish.

Commonly known as stout, it generally lives in tropical and subtropical deep waters. There is a meat-like protrusion above the head of the skull, which looks like a small lantern, which will glow. Many fish in the deep sea have phototaxis, so the small lantern becomes a weapon for the squid to lure food.

Living on the bottom of the sea, the eyes grow in the middle of the front side of the back. On each side of the ventral surface of the head and chest, there is a kidney-shaped honeycomb generator that can generate electricity for defense and capture of prey.
It is a small freshwater fish that can live in a dry environment and move forward with a wonderful body curve.
